HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY75 GOVERHHSHTSECRET.--,---- CAB I H E LCP. 208,125)^------- v.BRITISH EMPIRE EXHIBITION,THANKSGIVING SERVICE AT WEMBLEY,Note by the Secretary.I ha.ve received a, communication from the Comptroller General of the Department of Overseas Trade stating that an Empire Thanksgiving Service is being organised in connection with the British Empire Exhibition, to take placo in the Stadium at Wembley on Empire Day, Sunday, 24th May,Their Majesties will be present and the order of Service will be similar to that cf last year though shorter in duration.Members of the Cabinet who desire to attend are requested to let me know as soon as possible.(Signed) M,p0A0EANEEY.Whitehall Gardens, S.W.1, 22nd April, 1925. SECRET.CABINET. HOLE /FFAIES COiffllTTEE.THE RATING AND VALUATIOK BILL.Memorandum by the Minister of Health.The attached paper f CP.209 (25)) is circulated in connection with Item 2 on the Agenda Paper for the Meeting of the Committee of Rome Affairs to be held on Friday, April 24that 11 -a.m.2 Whitehall Gardens, S.W.1. 22nd April,.1925.
